channel.title: James Gan on James' Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in James Gan on James' Portfolio

item.title: Shopee Code League Hackathon 2020
item.description: Industry Hackathon - In my penultimate year, I took part in Shopee's Code League Hackathon 2020 which was for the first time completely held online due to the novel coronavirus situation. The challenge was held over the course of 8 week where there were 8 challenges that overlapped each other in the field of data science, machine learning, data analysis and natural language processing. [Link](https://careers.shopee.sg/codeleague/) to the hackathon page.

item.title: Exploratory Analysis of Data Science and Analytics Job Market in Singapore 2020
item.description: Personal Project - As graduation approaches, I decided that it would be beneficial to get an overview of the Data centred jobs in Singapore. Therefore, I decided to scrap the popular job site, Glassdoor, to gather data on the jobs on the market and have the bigger picture of the job market.
